com.yahoo.labs.samoa.moa.classifiers.core.splitcriteria

Class InfoGainSplitCriterion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.moa.AbstractMOAObject
      • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.moa.options.AbstractOptionHandler
        • com.yahoo.labs.samoa.moa.classifiers.core.splitcriteria.InfoGainSplitCriterion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.github.javacliparser.Configurable, SplitCriterion, MOAObject, OptionHandler, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InfoGainSplitCriterionMultilabel

    public class InfoGainSplitCriterion
extends AbstractOptionHandler
implements SplitCriterion
    Class for computing splitting criteria using information gain with respect to distributions of class values. The split criterion is used as a parameter on decision trees and decision stumps.
    Version:
    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
